leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of mouse-like fur quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new fur spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, [npc.her] toenails thicken into sharp claws, and little pink pads grow to cover [npc.her] soles, leaving [npc.herHim] with paw-like feet. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new fur smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] anthropomorphic, [style.boldMouse(mouse-like legs and hoofed feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into anthropomorphic, mouse-like paws, complete with claws and leathery pads.
